nodes.text: Janguine was a language used by a species of jungle-dwelling barbarians on the planet Janguine. The language fell into disuse approximately 300 years prior to the beginning of the Yuuzhan Vong War, when it was absorbed by the planet's Mooloolian mountain tribes.

Upon first hearing the Yuuzhan Vong language, the protocol droid C-3PO found that it was easy to understand due to its similarity to the Janguine language, though he doubted that it was likely the Yuuzhan Vong invaders hailed from the planet. In the process of researching the origins of the Yuuzhan Vong, scholars from the Institute for Sentient Studies attempted to follow up on C-3PO's observations, but proved to be a dead end.
Janguine was first mentioned in the 1999 novel The New Jedi Order: Vector Prime, written by R. A. Salvatore.
